greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerators of the sequence whose Dirichlet convolution with itself yields A065769 ("Prime cascade").
comment: Multiplicative because A065769 and A317932 are.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: a(n) = numerator of f(n), where f(1) = 1, f(n) = (1/2) * (A065769(n) - Sum_{d|n, d>1, d<n} f(d) * f(n/d)) for n > 1.
program: A003557(n) = { my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 2] = max(0,f[i, 2]-1)); factorback(f); };
DirSqrt(v) = {my(n=#v, u=vector(n)); u[1]=1; for(n=2, n, u[n]=(v[n]/v[1] - sumdiv(n, d, if(d>1&&d<n, u[d]*u[n/d], 0)))/2); u};
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 03 2018
